entry.title: Hunting Javascript File for Bug Hunters

link.title: Hunting Javascript File for Bug Hunters

entry.summary:
Hello Everyone,
Hope you’re all doing well, today we’re going to talk about JavaScript in penetration testing (bug-hunting) and how to find vulnerabilities in JS files manually and automatically. To start, let’s understand JavaScript.
Some Key Aspects Of JavaScript’s Significance In Web Development:
1. Interactivity: JavaScript is like the magic wand that makes web pages fun to use. It lets ...

entry.title: IDOR with Autorize!
entry.summary:
Hello Guys, what’s up, hope you guys all are doing well.
Here is my write-up, I’ll tell you about one of my discoveries and explain how to find IDOR(Insecure direct object references).
Insecure direct object references (IDOR) are a type of access control vulnerability that arises when an application uses user-supplied input to access objects directly..
